description: Describes the VPCs on the other side of a VPC peering or Transit Gateway connection that are referencing the security groups you've specified in this request.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The IDs of the security groups in your account. (string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupReferenceSet
nested_items.description: Information about the VPCs with the referencing security groups.

nested_items.name: GroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of your security group.

nested_items.name: ReferencingVpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC with the referencing security group.

nested_items.name: VpcPeeringConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC peering connection (if applicable). For more information about security group referencing for peering connections, see Update your security groups to reference peer security groups in the VPC Peering Guide.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway (if applicable).
